oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A lithium complex of a bis(amido)bis(imido)-silicate dianion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: COPSEY, MC
BALAKRISHNA, MS
CHIVERS, T
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: crystal-structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The title compound, bis[mu(3)-bis(tert-butylamido)bis(tert-butylimido) silyl]di-mu(3)-chloro-tetratetrahydrofuranhexalithium( I), [Li-6(C16H38N4Si)(2)Cl-2(C4H8O)(4)], crystallizes as a dimer of two contact ion pairs linked together by two molecules of lithium chloride. The two halves of the molecule are related by a crystallographic twofold rotation axis.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: ACTA CRYSTALLOGRAPHICA SECTION E-STRUCTURE REPORTS ONLINE, 62(), M1683-M1685
